AND s.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},'%')
AND (v.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR v.pinyin LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR v.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY s.contact_time DESC
